meanings.definition: The plural form of progeria, a rare genetic disorder characterized by accelerated aging in children.
meanings.sent1: Children with progerias age faster than their peers.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying progerias to find better treatments for affected children.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was filled with laughter as the kids imagined having progerias and becoming old overnight.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to have a case of progerias, rushing forward at an alarming pace.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed a character with progerias, showcasing the challenges of living with accelerated aging.
